name: KeyHen
description:
You are in your house, playing videogames or working. But suddenly... CHICKEN!!

A chicken is attacking your keyboard and you need to repair it.

Game made for MalagaJam 2020 and Global Game Jam 2020.

It is played with mouse and keyboard. Use the mouse (click) to take the chips. Search in your keyboard for the key to place it in its place.

Repository(Here you can found our socials and the process of the game): https://github.com/EduFdezSoy/key-hen

This game is also for the Global Game Jam 2020.
